WindowControls.MinimizeButtonHint: Add a minimize button on all floating windows.
WindowControls.OrganizedMinimizeHint: Organize minimized windows by placing them either on a bottom line or top bar.
WindowControls.PinnedButtonHint: Add a pin button on windows. If clicked, such windows may not be closed, only minimized.
WindowControls.PinnedDoubleTappingName: Double 'ESC' Tapping to minimize Pinned Windows
WindowControls.PinnedDoubleTappingHint: Windows that are currently pinned, will not be minimized when pressing 'ESC', unless it is pressed twice
WindowControls.RememberPinnedHint: Pinned Windows will automatically reopen when starting a new session
WindowControls.ClickOutsideMinimizeHint: Minimize all windows when clicking on the game board. Except for Dialogs and Configs.
WindowControls.MaximizeButtonHint: Add a maximize button on resizeable windows. May not work well with all systems
WindowControls.TaskbarColorHint: Color of the Taskbar when 'Top Taskbar' Organized Mode is enabled
